distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for libosinfo fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-13313: Fixed password leak via command line argument inside osinfo-install-script (bsc#1140749).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: libosinfo 1.5.0 allows local users to discover credentials by listing a process, because credentials are passed to osinfo-install-script via the command line.
notes.title: CVE description
